rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm... Is this even a Skell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0002
rows.name: I mean, the external armor, maybe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0002_2
rows.name:
But I'm not detecting ANY known materials
or components for the purple frame part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0003
rows.name: In fact, I can't even find a power source.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Maybe it's like...an idol or something?
To some alien god or whatever?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0005
rows.name: What about a cockpit? Or any space for a pilot?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Let's see here...
There is a cavity in the middle of the chest area...[ST:page p1=120 ]If this thing is a vehicle, that'd have to be the cockpit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hmm... Perhaps it's not a weapon?
It was abandoned, after all. And in that godforsaken place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0008
rows.name:
But it was also worth the Ganglion
sacrificing all those soldiers to try and recover it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0009
rows.name: Surely it must hold some value.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Granted. Now the question is whether we'll
be able to uncover it. Ms. Koo is one of our best...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0011
rows.name: but we can't expect her to work miracles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you ask me, that's time better spent
studying that Ares of yours, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0012_3
rows.name:
Ah, right, you wouldn't know what I'm talking about,
would you? Let me explain. The Ares is what Elmaâ€”[ST:wait ]
